text: Mother 1 + 2 is a video game for the Game Boy Advance which includes Mother and Mother 2 (known as EarthBound outside of Japan). Much of the music is different than the console games (Mother 2 is mostly the same, but Mother was changed a lot to make it similar to the United States one that was not sold). == Other websites == * Official Mother 1 + 2 website (Japan) * Mother Party (Japanese) * Mother 1 + 2 Starmen.Net * Mother2.net * EarthBound IPM Category:Game Boy Advance games Category:2003 video games Category:Mother (video game series) Category:Japan-exclusive video games
title: Mother 1 + 2
